text: The Murchison Award, also referred to as the Murchison Grant, was first given by the Royal Geographical Society in 1882 for publications judged to have contributed most to geographical science in preceding recent years. ==Recipients== Source (1882–1982): British Museum Source (1970 onwards) Royal Geographical Society ==See also== * List of geography awards == References == == External links == *Royal Geographical Society Category:Awards of Royal Geographical Society Category:Awards established in 1882
title: Murchison Award
